resources.string: Ready to take the quiz? you have only 10mins.
1.Brass gets discoloured in air because of the presence of which of the following gasses in air?
2.Carbon has two compound, graphite and what?.
3.Which of the following materials are used in pencil production?
4.The smallest indivisible particle of matter is called?
5.Which of the following is a non metal that remain liquid at room temperaure?
6.what is that which has mass and occupy space?
7.What are the three states of matter?
8.The freezing point of ice is what degree Centigrade
9.Chlorophyll is a naturally occurring chelate compound in which central metal is?
10.The boiling point of water is what degree centigrade
